alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Eastern Essex; Eastern King and Queen; Eastern Louisa; Richmond; Western Essex; Western Hanover; Western King William; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Louisa, northern King and Queen, western Richmond, Caroline, southwestern Westmoreland, northwestern Hanover, northwestern King William and Essex Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a scattered strong thunderstorms near Milford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy downpours, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Tappahannock, Warsaw, Bowling Green, Mineral, Montross, Champlain, Saint Stephens Church, Milford, Hanover, Dawn, Loretto, Mangohick, Millers Tavern, Newtown, Newland, Dunnsville, Bumpass, Beulahville and Center Cross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Eastern Essex; Eastern King and Queen; Eastern Louisa; Richmond; Western Essex; Western Hanover; Western King William; Western King and Queen; Westmoreland
